meanings.definition: The quality or state of being retrievable.
meanings.sent1: The retrievabilities of lost items in the store were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The retrievabilities of data from the cloud storage were quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The retrievabilities of memories from my forgetful friend always bring a smile.
meanings.sent4: The retrievabilities of information from the internet are like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent5: The retrievabilities of important documents are crucial for our work.

meanings.definition: The ability to be retrieved or recovered.
meanings.sent1: The retrievabilities of the missing keys saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent2: The retrievabilities of the lost files were a relief to the team.
meanings.sent3: The retrievabilities of the escaped dog made us chase him around the park.
meanings.sent4: The retrievabilities of the stolen necklace were like a detective story.
meanings.sent5: The retrievabilities of the misplaced phone were a lifesaver during emergencies.
